resources.string: "Along with bug fixes, this update also includes new and enhanced features."
"Changes in this release can be found in the app information, under “New Features”."

string-array.name: new_release_body
string-array.item: "An increased risk after an exposure is now only displayed for ten days instead of 14."

"The red tile for increased risk is now displayed after an exposure even if you have registered a positive test in the Corona-Warn-App. Your risk status is shown again seven days after the positive test."
"If you have another exposure with increased risk after a previous exposure, a notification will now be displayed for this exposure as well."
"If your status has changed (because you added a certificate, for example, or because the rules have changed), you will be notified of this on the Certificates tab."
"Validity data is no longer displayed for certificates of recovery, because their validity depends on the local rules. The date of the first positive test is now displayed instead."

"The QR code for your currently used certificate has been removed from the detail screen for individuals, creating more space for notifications and decluttering the screen in general. The QR code is also contained in the certificate overview and is therefore not needed on the detail screen."
